#Data Description Table
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
load("../data/allLengths.rda")
tally <- as.data.frame(group_by_at(allLengths, vars(year, region, shore, species)) %>% tally())
tally <- na.omit(tally)
knitr::kable(tally)
```

#Regional Description Table
```{r}
regions <- read.csv("../data/regions.csv")
knitr::kable(regions)
```
